locations.name: Valley of Flowers
locations.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site known for its stunning meadows of wildflowers.

locations.name: Kedarkantha
locations.description: A popular winter trek that offers a breathtaking view of the snow-capped Himalayan peaks.

locations.name: Roopkund Lake
locations.description: A high-altitude trek leading to a mysterious lake surrounded by snow-covered peaks.

locations.name: Chadar Trek
locations.description: A thrilling winter trek on the frozen Zanskar River, offering a unique trekking experience.

locations.name: Hampta Pass
locations.description: A scenic trek through lush valleys and high mountain passes.

locations.name: Markha Valley
locations.description: One of the most popular trekking routes in Ladakh, offering views of traditional villages and Buddhist monasteries.

locations.name: Sikkim Singalila Ridge
locations.description: A high-altitude trek offering panoramic views of the Kanchenjunga and other peaks.

locations.name: Tadiandamol
locations.description: The highest peak in Coorg, offering a moderate trek with scenic views of coffee plantations.

locations.name: Brahmatal
locations.description: A popular winter trek through dense forests, offering spectacular views of the Himalayan peaks.

locations.name: Sandakphu
locations.description: The highest point in West Bengal, offering incredible views of Mount Everest, Kanchenjunga, and other peaks.
locations.bestTimeToVisit: April to May, September to December
